nodes.text: Thull's Shroud was a location situated near the Mid Rim astronomical object Belsavis. During the High Republic Era, the Nihil marauder group operated near Thull's Shroud, but was small and disorganized. Asgar Ro found the Nihil and offered them the use of the unconvential hyperspace routes known as the Paths, reorganizing the structure and becoming Eye of the Nihil.
